faq.heading: ‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions
faq.services_q1: What types of cleaning services do you offer?
faq.services_a1: We specialize in residential and commercial cleaning, including carpet cleaning, deep cleans, move-in/move-out cleaning, and post-renovation services.
faq.services_q2: Do you bring your own supplies and equipment?
faq.services_a2: Yes, we bring eco-friendly cleaning products and professional-grade equipment to every job.
faq.services_q3: Are your cleaning products safe for pets and children?
faq.services_a3: Absolutely. We use non-toxic, eco-friendly products that are safe for both pets and kids.
faq.services_q4: Do you offer one-time cleaning or only recurring services?
faq.services_a4: We offer both one-time cleanings and flexible recurring plans tailored to your needs.
faq.services_a5: Yes, you can request extras like carpet shampooing, window cleaning, and appliance deep cleans when booking.
faq.process_q1: How do I book a cleaning service?
faq.process_a1: You can book online through our website form, or call/text us directly for quick scheduling.
faq.process_q2: Do I need to be home during the cleaning?
faq.process_a2: Not necessarily. Many clients provide access instructions, and we ensure your property is secure at all times.
faq.process_q3: Are your cleaners insured and background-checked?
faq.process_a3: Yes, all our team members are trained, insured, and background-checked for your peace of mind.
faq.process_a4: We proudly serve the Greater Toronto Area (GTA), including Toronto, Mississauga, Scarborough, North York, and nearby regions.
faq.process_a5: We ask for at least 24 hours‚Äô notice to cancel or reschedule, otherwise a small cancellation fee may apply.
faq.pricing_a1: Pricing depends on the size of your space, type of service, and any custom add-ons requested.
faq.pricing_a2: Yes, we provide free online and phone estimates, and you can also request a custom quote through our website.
faq.pricing_q3: Is there a minimum charge for services?
faq.pricing_a3: Yes, we have a minimum service charge to cover travel and supplies, which we disclose upfront before booking.
faq.pricing_q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.pricing_a4: We accept major credit cards, e-transfers, and cash. Invoices are always provided for transparency.
faq.pricing_q5: Do you offer any discounts or promotions?
faq.pricing_a5: Yes, we run seasonal promotions and first-time client discounts. Check our website or ask when booking for current offers.

products_and_services.our_services_description: Explore our range of professional cleaning services designed to meet your needs. From residential to commercial, we have you covered. Our team is dedicated to providing top-notch cleaning solutions that ensure a spotless and healthy environment. Whether you need regular maintenance or a one-time deep clean, we customize our services to fit your requirements. Contact us today to learn more about how we can help you achieve a cleaner space. Check out our site regularly for updates on new services and special offers.
products_and_services.our_products_description: Discover our range of cleaning products and solutions that ensure a spotless home and workplace.
residential_cleaning_description: Complete cleaning of homes, apartments, and condominiums.
Carpet Cleaning to revitalize and maintain the freshness of carpets.
Furniture cleaning to preserve its beauty and prolong its lifespan.
commercial_cleaning_description: Regular maintenance of offices and commercial spaces.
Cleaning of shopping centers and supermarkets.
Specialized services for the film industry and special events.
window_cleaning_description: Professional cleaning of windows in homes and businesses.
Streak-free shine for a clear view.
Use of eco-friendly products for safety and sustainability.
carpet_cleaning_description: Deep cleaning of carpets in homes and commercial spaces.
Upholstery cleaning to maintain the beauty and comfort of furniture.
power_washing_description: High-pressure cleaning for driveways, sidewalks, and patios.
Removal of dirt, mold, and mildew from exterior surfaces.
Preparation of surfaces for painting or sealing.

about.welcome_text: At CleanAR Solutions, we provide professional cleaning services in Toronto and the GTA. Our focus on excellence ensures every project meets the highest standards, creating a clean and healthy environment. Whether you need residential, commercial, or carpet cleaning, we customize our approach to meet your needs. Get started by requesting a quote, or contact us for more information.
about.mission_text: Our mission is to transform spaces into cleaner, healthier, and more welcoming environments. We achieve this by offering customizable, high-quality cleaning services that are tailored to our clients‚Äô needs while staying true to our commitment to sustainability and excellence.
about.vision_text: Our vision is to become Toronto‚Äôs most trusted and innovative cleaning service provider, setting the standard for excellence while contributing to a cleaner, greener, and happier community.
about.values_intro: At CleanAR Solutions, we are guided by the following values:
values_list: Integrity: We conduct our business with honesty, transparency, and accountability.
Quality: We deliver top-tier cleaning services with attention to detail and excellence.
Customer Focus: We prioritize our clients‚Äô unique needs, building trust through personalized solutions.
Sustainability: We promote eco-friendly cleaning practices to protect our environment.
Teamwork: We value collaboration, respect, and unity to achieve success together.

residential.title: Residential Buildings
items: General Cleaning: Complete cleaning of common areas such as lobbies, hallways, stairs, and recreational areas.
Exterior Area Maintenance: Cleaning of sidewalks, courtyards, and parking areas.
Trash Management: Collection and proper disposal of waste and garbage.

offices.title: Offices
items: Daily Cleaning: Cleaning of desks, tables, chairs, and break areas.
Floor Maintenance: Sweeping, mopping, and polishing of floors.
Bathroom Cleaning: Disinfection and deep cleaning of bathrooms and sanitary areas.

festivals.title: Festivals
items: Pre-Event Cleaning: Cleaning of the event area before its start, including garbage collection and grounds cleaning.
Event Maintenance: Continuous maintenance of bathrooms, rest areas, and food areas during the event.
Post-Event Cleaning: Thorough cleaning of the event area after its conclusion, including garbage collection and site sanitation.

form.title: Get Your Free Quote
form.description: Fill out the form below to receive a personalized quote for your cleaning needs. Our team will review your request and get back to you as soon as possible.

form.serviceDescription: Please add service type and level to customize your order.

form.additionalServices: Please select any additional services you would like to add to your quote.
form.confirmationMessage: A confirmation email will be sent to you upon submission. Our team will review your request and get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for choosing CleanAR Solutions!

tooltips.name: Enter your full name.
tooltips.promoCode: Enter your promo code. Discount will be reflected on the quote if eligible. Promos cannot be combined.

We will be in touch shortly to discuss your needs. In the meantime, feel free to browse our services.
